description: Nepal Telecom introduced SIP phone (Session Initial Protocol) with its brand name NT EasyPhone. Using NT EasyPhone subscriber can make voice calls from their mobile having broadband internet connection. EasyPhone can be used from anywhere in the world, anytime to call everywhere in the world at cheap economical rates.
account_number_format: Permanent and Unique Account Number – Range 604xxxxx

features: Permanent and Unique Account Number – Range 604xxxxx.
Both international and national (to NT PSTN/GSM/VSAT network) calls can be made from anywhere with internet access.
EasyPhone can be used from anywhere in the world, anytime to call everywhere in the world at cheap economical rates.
Free EasyPhone to EasyPhone (SIP to SIP) calls.
Can be used from SIP devices and Smart mobiles with NT EasyPhone applications.

instructions: Call 1498 and ask the operator for further support.

office: Nepal Telecom Kathmandu Regional Directorate, Intelligent Network (IN) Section, Sundhara, Kathmandu
